caption.p: M. pulegium, detail of the different kinds of trichomes present on the leaf ( a, b): capitate type I ( a, red arrow); capitate type II ( b, green arrow), and short non-glandular trichome ( b, black arrow). ( c, d) (leaf) and ( e, f) (flower calyx): peltate trichomes on the leaf ( c) and calyx ( e). At higher magnification a high number of secretory cells, arranged in two circles within the head, can be observed ( e, f, white arrows).
